tool_description: Automate website screenshots creation.  Generate screenshots in a matter of seconds.  Never busy, so there's no waiting in line.  Rendering starts immediately and is finished quickly.
name: Pagepeeker
title: Pagepeeker

api_list.name: 2. Thumbnail ready
api_list.description: Poll this API until it returns that the image is available.  If available, you can download through endpoint 1.  Rendering an image depends largely on how fast a particular web page is loaded (and if it contains Flash).  Average waiting time is around 20 - 60 seconds

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: t = Tiny, 90 x 68 pixels;  s= Small, 120 x 90 pixels;  m = Medium, 200 x 150 pixels; l = Large, 400 x 300 pixels;  x = Extra large, 480 x 360 pixels

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL to generate the thumbnail from

api_list.name: 1. Shoot thumbnail
api_list.description: Issues a reset API call if refresh is set to 1. Else it will download if the image is ready (see endpoint 2.)

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: t = Tiny, 90 x 68 pixels;  s= Small, 120 x 90 pixels;  m = Medium, 200 x 150 pixels; l = Large, 400 x 300 pixels;  x = Extra large, 480 x 360 pixels

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL to generate the thumbnail from

optional_parameters.name: refresh
optional_parameters.description: This parameter forces the currently generate d thumbnail to be regenerated.  It is optional and will be ignored unless it contains the value 1
